com.att.research.xacml.api.pdp

Class PDPEngineFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.att.research.xacml.api.pdp.PDPEngineFactory
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ATTPDPEngineFactory

    public abstract class PDPEngineFactory
extends java.lang.Object
    PDPEngineFactory provides the interface for creating com.att.research.xacml.pep.PDPEngine instances.
    Version:
    ${Revision}
    Author:
    car

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Decision getDefaultBehavior()
      Gets the default Decision that a PDPEngine created from this PDPEngineFactory will return when there is no applicable root policy.
      ScopeResolver getScopeResolver()
      Gets the current ScopeResolver used by PDPEngines created with this PDPEngineFactory will use to expand scope attributes in a Request.
      abstract PDPEngine newEngine()
      Creates a new PDPEngine using the default policy set and PIPFinder.
      static PDPEngineFactory newInstance()
      Creates a new PDPEngineFactory instance by examining initialization resources from various places to determine the class to instantiate and return.
      static PDPEngineFactory newInstance(java.lang.String factoryClassName)
      Creates a new PDPEngineFactory instance using the given class name and the default thread class loader.
      static PDPEngineFactory newInstance(java.lang.String factoryClassName, java.lang.ClassLoader classLoader)
      Creates a new PDPEngineFactory instance using the given class name and ClassLoader.
      void setDefaultBehavior(Decision decision)
      Sets the default Decision that a PDPEngine created from this PDPEngineFactory will return when there is no applicable root policy.
      void setScopeResolver(ScopeResolver scopeResolverIn)
      Sets the ScopeResolver used by PDPEngines created with this PDPEngineFactory.

                                    throws FactoryException
        Creates a new PDPEngineFactory instance by examining initialization resources from various places to determine the class to instantiate and return.

        public static PDPEngineFactory newInstance(java.lang.String factoryClassName,
                           java.lang.ClassLoader classLoader)
                                    throws FactoryException
        Creates a new PDPEngineFactory instance using the given class name and ClassLoader. If the ClassLoader is null, use the default thread class loader.
        Parameters:
        factoryClassName - the String name of the factory class to instantiate
        classLoader - the ClassLoader to use to load the factory class
        Returns:
        an instance of an object that extends PDPEngineFactory to use in creating PDPEngine objects.
        Throws:
        FactoryException
